original: @273a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @273a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s+yashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s+yashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Shri Mahakalashtamantrastotranam.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise of Glorious Mahakalashta, called the Eight Lines.

original: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Mahakalashta.

original: aom grub par gyur cig / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i //
analyzed: aom grub par gyur cig / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i //
translated: Om, may it be accomplished! With the fierce sound of hum hum phat, you are able to fill the entire three worlds.

original: ha ha ta ta zhes bzhad sgra yis gang zhig dus kun du ni shin tu 'jigs mdzad @273b cing ;
analyzed: ha ha ta ta zhes bzhad sgra yis gang zhig dus kun du ni shin tu 'jigs mdzad @273b cing ;
translated: With the sound of ha ha ta ta, you always terrify.

original: / kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la spras shing nag po'i mthu dang mtshungs pa'i sku //
analyzed: / kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la spras shing nag po'i mthu dang mtshungs pa'i sku //
translated: With the sound of kam kam kam, your head is adorned with a garland of skulls, and your body is equal to the power of black.

original: bhrum bhrum bhrum zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa'i khva gdangs sha za zhing //
analyzed: bhrum bhrum bhrum zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa'i khva gdangs sha za zhing //
translated: With the sound of bhrum bhrum bhrum, you are the supreme angry one, with terrifying frowns, a terrifying crow face, and you eat flesh.

original: dbu skra dang ni smar ches ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyod khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
analyzed: dbu skra dang ni smar ches ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyod khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
translated: With your hair and beard yellow, you move in the field of enjoyment. Protect me.

original: ram ram ram zhes spyan mar 'khrug cing bsgyur mdzad krum krum krum zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs //
analyzed: ram ram ram zhes spyan mar 'khrug cing bsgyur mdzad krum krum krum zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs //
translated: Ram ram ram, you stir and move the eye of Dhatr. Krum krum krum, you look with the eye of proclamation.

original: smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod //
analyzed: smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod //
translated: With yellow brows, bared fangs, and a corpse seat, you are the protector of the field.

original: ha ha h'um dang k'i li k'i li zhes sgrogs phyag g-yon kha tv'am gar bcas thod pa bsnams //
analyzed: ha ha h'um dang k'i li k'i li zhes sgrogs phyag g-yon kha tv'am gar bcas thod pa bsnams //

original: sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dag thos cing 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs //
analyzed: sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dag thos cing 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs //
translated: Sam sam sam, protect those who hear, hold, and protect the collection of your mantras.

original: bam bam bam zhes gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: bam bam bam zhes gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
translated: Bam bam bam, like Yama, seeing the various stainless things, like the water.

original: yam yam yam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen //
analyzed: yam yam yam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen //
translated: Yam yam yam, the speed of the wind, quickly moving, knowing the afflictions, the world, the harm-doers.

original: klam klim klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
analyzed: klam klim klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
translated: Klam klam klam, with a wrathful form, the three existences, day and night, always afflicted.

original: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
analyzed: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
translated: Pam pam pam, with a noose of compassion, the animals are held, with a hand, the disciples are protected.

original: sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster //
analyzed: sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster //
translated: The lord of mantras, the one with a mantra body, the mantra in the mind, gives the result, incomparable intelligence, to the mantra practitioners.

original: zhing rnams skyod bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyang du gso //
analyzed: zhing rnams skyod bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyang du gso //
translated: You who shake the fields, please protect the bodies of beings for a long time without exception.

original: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon 'ga' zhig dam tshig gang zhig blo ldan gus pa yi //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon 'ga' zhig dam tshig gang zhig blo ldan gus pa yi //
translated: Some masters of the practitioner, whatever the pledge, the wise one, with devotion,

original: thung nyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par gyur pa dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang mthu stobs 'byor ba 'dzin dang gzi brjid rgyas pa mtshungs pa med //
analyzed: thung nyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par gyur pa dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang mthu stobs 'byor ba 'dzin dang gzi brjid rgyas pa mtshungs pa med //
translated: The eight mantras are recited in two short [verses]. He becomes endowed with merit, and his life, glory, fame, strength, wealth, and splendor are unequalled.

original: sa steng dang ni mtho ris su'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa steng dang ni mtho ris su'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
translated: On the earth and in heaven, his hosts of obstacles are always destroyed.

original: dpal nag po chen po la bstod ba rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la bstod ba rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
